author: Jason Lemon
title: Virginia Governor Orders State Residents to Stay at Home Until June 10 Amid Coronavirus Pandemic
description: "I want to be clear: Do not go out unless you need to go out," Governor Ralph Northam said.
content:
Virginia Governor Ralph Northam joined a growing number of states in issuing a stringent "stay at home" order on Monday, telling residents to remain in their homes except for essential purposes until June 10.
Many states and municipalities across the country… [+2538 chars]
